akas: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (original title)
akas from release info: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (original title)

1.title: North of Known

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Traversing the over 500- miles long Alaska Range, Gavin McClurg and Dave Turner embark on the most remote and ambitious paragliding expedition ever attempted.

2.title: Voyage of the Finnmen

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Adventurers Olly Hicks and George Bullard are undertaking a 1,200 miles long journey from Greenland to Scotland in a sea kayak.

3.title: Calm in the Dark

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: As Australia's most awarded cave-dive photographer, Liz has found her own caves to explore - the virgin caves in of Timor, Indonesia.

4.title: One and a Half Canoes

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: The Torres Strait is a drowned land bridge that no one has crossed in over 6000 years. Four men in self-carved canoes are about to try.

5.title: Open Space

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: South African born endurance adventurer Ness Knight is undertaking the first ever solo FAT bike trek across the Namibia.

6.title: Into Twin Galaxies

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Three National Geographic "adventurers of the Year " embark on an insane kayaking mission in Greenland. With kite skis they tow their white water kayaks over 1000 km of the Greenland Ice Cap to reach the most northern river ever paddled.

1.title: Karina Hollekim at Fatima's Hand

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: This episode (directed by award winning Jens Hoffmann) centers around the Norwegian B.A.S.E. jumper and free skiing star Karina Hollekim and her riveting Hand of Fatima B.A.S.E. jumping venture at Mount Hombori - Mali's highest peak (1,155 m) on the edge of the world's most imposing desert. The legendary top athlete has always thrived on pushing herself to the limit, but this unique journey proved to be extreme in more ways than expected. In an unforgiving environment Karina Hollekim has to face ferocious heat, a vicious sand storm, thorny undergrowth and wind turning...

2.title: Steve Fisher at Zambezi Deluge

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: In one amazing journey, kayaking legend Steve Fisher (South Africa) returns to the Zambezi, one of the world's most treacherous waterways, raging at the highest levels in a decade, to take on a thrilling challenge that most would consider a death wish.

3.title: Stephen Redmond at Oceans Seven

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Stephen Redmond has already achieved to swim six channels and straits in six oceans. But only the seventh channel, the Tsugaru Strait between the Japanese main island and Hokkaido, will make him the first man to swim the iconic Seven Oceans. A death defying swim of 14 hours in 12°C cold open sea.

4.title: Ueli Steck at The North Face Trilogy

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: The infamous north faces of "Eiger", "Grandes Jorasses" and "Matterhorn" are awesome challenges just for the best climbers. Swiss speed climbing legend Ueli Steck doesn't let things scorch. He conquers in free solo style this trio of threat in only hours - no rope, no bolt was needed.

5.title: The Huber Buam at Mt. Asgard

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: The climbing brothers Thomas and Alexander Huber attempt to conquer free the infamous "Bavarian Direttissima" (upper tenth degree of difficulty) on the iconic Mt. Asgard on the Arctic Baffin Island (Canada). A 40 days expedition with polar bears, frostbite and climbing at the peril of their lifes.

6.title: Big Wave Surfers at Pororoca

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Pororoca means "great destructive noise " in the indigenous language and is a tidal bore with waves up to four meters high, travelling as much as 13 km inland upstream on the Amazon River. Surfing the Pororoca is especially dangerous, as the water contains a significant amount of debris, often entire trees, in addition to dangerous fauna. Australian big wave surf legend Ross Clarke-Jones is taking the challenge to surf one of the highest bores ever recorded.

1.title: Deep Everest

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot:

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

4.title: Across the Ice: The Greenland Victory March

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

5.title: The Mysterious Cloud

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

6.title: Expedition to the Bottom of the World

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Deep underground in the wilderness of New Zealand gigantic and widely unexplored cave systems entice adventurers and cavers of the entire globe. Kieran McKay, one of the most accomplished cavers in the southern hemisphere and his team of like-minded adventurers set out for the almost impossible: they try to find the "cave connection". If they happened to track through the approximately 80 missing meters between the systems "Nettlebed" and "Stormy Pot" they could claim credit for having found the largest cave in the southern hemisphere and one of the Top Five caves on ...

1.title: Frozen Titans

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: The unique spray ice formations at Helmcken Falls, British Columbia, are considered the hardest ice and mixed climbing spot in the world. The 140-meter cave is a terrifying complex of giant, overhung icicles and thus has become Will Gadd's obsession and the leading edge of modern ice climbing.

2.title: Steve Fisher in: Congo - Braving the Inga Rapids

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: The Inga Rapids of the Congo River are deemed as the holy grail of kayaking. But it's not only the perilous whirlpool in the middle of the river, it's the outside conditions in an instable country as well endangering the project . Thus "Congo" becomes the adventure of a lifetime for world class kayaker Steve Fisher.

3.title: Stefan Glowacz in: Roraima Mysteries

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: When climbing legend Stefan Glowacz embarks with his team on an expedition to Mount Roraima, he has no idea what they got themselves into. A tragic accident adds to the drama which unfolds set against the backdrop of Guyana's tropical rain forest and the steep walls of the breathtaking table mountain.

4.title: Chris Sharma in: Into the Light

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Majlis al Jinn, a huge subterranean chamber in Oman, is big enough to house the Great Pyramid of Giza. After a 170m free hanging rappel, Chris Sharma and his partner set out for a record breaking ascent from the deepest point of the cave following the enormous arch, fighting gravity, climbing upside down back into the light.

5.title: Rafa Ortiz in: The Angel Wings Experience

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Led by Mexican pro Rafa Ortiz, a team of world-class kayakers attempts an audacious record-setting run on the Mexican Rio Santo Domingo, the steepest navigable section of whitewater on earth. When attempting to run the most difficult section of the falls something goes completely wrong...

6.title: A Date with the Strait Clean

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: The Bass Strait is a strip of water dividing the Australian mainland from Tasmania. Sailors stand in awe of the strong currents, knowing that wild storms make the strait twice as rough as the English Channel. In a death defying act three brave Aussies attempt to paddle the whole 300 km across the Bass Strait from shore to shore kneeling on their boards. The adventure takes several days with stops on small islands along the way. Win-or-bust Zeb Walsh, Brad Gaul and Jack Bark have to face sickness, muscle soreness and dehydration, apart from sharks, currents and ...

7.title: Alaskan Unrideables

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: From the early days in the French Alps speed riding has evolved into the most demanding and unquestionable dangerous snow sports. Speed riding describes a combination of skiing and paragliding but both at the fastest variant. Three venturesome athletes head out to the Alaska Range with wings in their backpacks for the adventure of a lifetime. Jon DeVore, Filippo Fabbi, and Andy Farrington are the most accomplished athletes in their game - however, the area of choice - bearing frightening names as devil's paw - is so remote that every wrong move could end in a fatal ...

8.title: The Crystal Labyrinth

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The Caribbean island chain of the Bahamas is home to some of the world's most stunning and extensive underwater caves. Within this spectacular backdrop the Abaco Islands host a massive underwater crystal cave network, which has not been fully explored yet. Diving legend Brian Kakuk has tried to find a connection between two of the largest cave systems for many years. In June 2014 he will make the final push to connect together Dan's Cave and Ralph's Cave. If they succeed, they explore the largest cave system of its type in the world. If they fail - well, do not even ...

9.title: The Rocky Mountains Traverse

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: In August 2014 Will Gadd and Gavin McClurg, two accomplished paragliders, attempt to complete the first ever paragliding traverse of the Rocky Mountain Range, North America's most iconic and by far wildest region. At a distance of over 1.200 km from Canada to the U.S., flying across rugged terrain and landing on mountain tops to camp for the night, this journey will smash almost any current long distance flight record.

10.title: The Erebus Enigma

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Spitting Distance - First Descent Into a Raging Volcano

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Explorer Ulla Lohmann, Climber Sebastian Hofmann and volcanologist Thomas Boyer attempt a 500m descent into the crater of the active Benbow volcano, one of only seven volcanoes in the world displaying an active lava lake.

2.title: Cape Verdean Kite Crossing

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Mitu Monteiro, a Cape Verdean kite surfer and multi-time world champion, attempts the solo crossing of the twelve volcanic islands of his native archipelago, taking on more than 730km only by man - powered means.

3.title: Paddle SUP - Mission Amazon

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: In an epic eight-week mission Charlie Head will standup paddle from the source of the Amazon, the Rio Marañón in Peru 1.800km down river to Iquitos.

4.title: Locked In

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Ben Stookesberry, Chris Korbulic, Benny Marr and Pedro Oliva travel to Papua New Guinea to conquer whitewater that no kayakers have navigated before: The Beriman River Gorge - one of the most significant undertakings in a kayak.

5.title: Dare to Soar - Flying with the Condors

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Two paragliding champions try to simulate the flight of a soaring Andean Condor from sea level up into the 5000m Peruvian mountain range.

6.title: My Own Private Monster

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Australian Alastair McLeod sets off on a windsurfing mission into the open ocean, searching for the fiercest wave ever surfed under sail.

7.title: Onekotan - The Lost Island

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: "Onekotan" is a remote island with a collapsed volcano at its centre, off the coast of Kamchtachka, Russia. It is one of the most isolated places on earth. The weather is ferocious and unpredictable. The conditions are uninhabitable. For Matthias Haunholder, Phil Meier and Matthias Mayr it is the ultimate ski mountaineering expedition.

8.title: Citadel

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Renowned filmmaker Alister Lee, follows two top UK alpinists on a first ascent attempt in a stunning and remote corner of Alaska.

9.title: Cerro Torre

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Set against the backdrop of breathtaking Patagonia, David Lama, climbing's wunderkind, sets out to climb the infamous south-east face of Cerro Torre, a Argentinian mountain once said to be the most difficult in the world.

10.title: Stratos - Mission to the Edge of Space

episode of.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: In Mission Stratos Felix Baumgartner ascended to 128,100 feet in a stratospheric balloon and made a freefall jump rushing toward earth at supersonic speeds before parachuting to the ground.

imdb.plot outline: In a world in which all boundaries seem to have been conquered, adventurers and extreme sports people restlessly seek out new challenges. They try to defeat the impregnable, make come through the impossible - despite all threatening risks and hazarding perilous efforts. "Explorers - adventures of the century" profiles the wild dozen of the most exceptional protagonists - both men and women - in their quest for the adventures of the new century. Here's kayaker Steve Fisher as he conquers the hundred year flood on the treacherous Zambezi River, no exit point is too extreme for BASE-jumpers Valery Rozov and Karina Hollekim, while Irish marathon swimmer Stephen Redmond withstands the gruelling open sea to become the first to swim the iconic Seven Oceans. They all venture into new terrain, going to their personal limits and take the viewer on the adventure of a lifetime.
imdb.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century
plot: In a world in which all boundaries seem to have been conquered, adventurers and extreme sports people restlessly seek out new challenges. They try to defeat the impregnable, make come through the impossible - despite all threatening risks and hazarding perilous efforts. "Explorers - adventures of the century" profiles the wild dozen of the most exceptional protagonists - both men and women - in their quest for the adventures of the new century. Here's kayaker Steve Fisher as he conquers the hundred year flood on the treacherous Zambezi River, no exit point is too extreme for BASE-jumpers Valery Rozov and Karina Hollekim, while Irish marathon swimmer Stephen Redmond withstands the gruelling open sea to become the first to swim the iconic Seven Oceans. They all venture into new terrain, going to their personal limits and take the viewer on the adventure of a lifetime.::Wolfgang Merkel
